column2: Drive Patient Safety & Quality as highest priority in the organization
column3:
Further strengthened our Patient Safety & Quality culture, capabilities and
performance. Significant progress made on managing the recall, and
addressing consent decree requirements.
On-time delivery of orders as per customer expectations significantly improved.

column2: Drive focused strategy to win in the market
column3:
Market share gains achieved in some Businesses. Solid progress on execution
priorities, with opportunities to accelerate growth strategies.

column2: Establish simplified, more agile operating model
column3:
Targets for operating model simplification and the headcount reduction plan
were responsibly achieved.

ESG index realization significantly ahead of target. Employee engagement
significantly up ahead of target. Succession plans and talent development as
per plan.
